Scott:

I have changed the excluded.properties in junit.jar before i run the 
junit test. Here is the content in the file:


excluded.0=sun.*
excluded.1=com.sun.*
excluded.2=org.omg.*
excluded.3=javax.*
excluded.4=sunw.*
excluded.5=java.*
excluded.6=org.w3c.dom.*
excluded.7=org.xml.sax.*
excluded.8=net.jini.*

Weel, I still  got the error as I described in the previous post. Any 
ideas?

do

run

> > Could not start test case: java.lang.ClassCastException:

> > 
> > 
> > Please help.
